post.title: Odd Synergy
post.content: I picked up a refferer from the MSDN magazine internal site sometime in the last 24 hours, so I’m guessing the article will be posted tomorrow. I’ve been saying for months that Feb ’03 was going to be big with my first child and, much less important, my first published article. Now it appears child and article will both be “publicly available” the same day. My wife Julie is going to be induced first thing tomorrow. Funny how these things work out.
